alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:28AM EST until March 06 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...Indiana... Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Paulding, Putnam and Allen OH Counties. Maumee River near Defiance affecting Defiance and Henry Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Ohio...Indiana... Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Defiance, De Kalb and Allen IN Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Lowland and farmland flooding near the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
